page.title: 04INSIDE EASTERTOUN PRIMARY
page.content:
THE SCHOOL DAY: {9.00-10.30:CLASSES {10.30-10.45:INTERVAL {10.45-12.15:CLASSES {12.15-13.00:LUNCH BREAK
P1-3 : {13.00-13.50:CLASSES {13.50-14.00:TOILET {14.00-14.25:CLASSES
P4-7 : {13.00-15.00:CLASSES
THE MAIN THINGS TAUGHT IN EASTERTOUN ARE :{LANGUAGE ,MATHS ,ENVIRONMENTAL {STUDIES ,THE ARTS,P.E. ,O.E.} INDIVIDUAL, GROUP AND CLASS TEACHING METHODS ARE USED AT EASTERTOUN. A GROUP MAY BE FORMED OF CHILDREN FROM MORE THAN ONE CLASS. THIS GROUP MAY BE TAUGHT BY A MEMBER OF STAFF OTHER THAN THE CHILD'S CLASS TEACHER FOR SOME ASPECT OF THE CURRICULUM.
